$1B+ Locked in Compute & Coordination. $TAO   TAO is pushing agents, and networks coordinate value through open, incentive-driven systems, $DOT  has focused on interoperability at scale, enabling specialized chains to communicate, share security, and move value without fragmentation.  Both point to the same shift: crypto infrastructure is moving toward coordination layers, not isolated chains.  Hemi extends that coordination to Bitcoin. By connecting BTC with Ethereum-style programmability, Hemi allows Bitcoin to participate in AI-driven systems, crosschain liquidity, and onchain coordination without leaving its security model.  Coordination is scaling. Bitcoin is entering the networked economy.  #Altcoin Season#  #AI
